extensionAttribute.description: This attribute verifies the "Display Sleep" timer energy saver setting. The value to be verified will need to be specified when creating this extension attribute. Example: "30" verifies that the "Display Sleep" timer is set to put the display to sleep after 30 minutes.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh desiredValue="EditFromTemplate_Desired_Value_-_Example:_30" result="" tmpResult="`/usr/bin/pmset -g | grep -w displaysleep | awk '{print $2}'`" if [ "$tmpResult" == "$desiredValue" ]; then result="true" elif [ "$tmpResult" == "" ]; then result="Domain or Key Not Found" else result="$tmpResult" fi if [ "$result" == "true" ]; then echo "<result>Pass ($tmpResult)</result>" else echo "<result>Fail ($tmpResult)</result>" fi
